Uses of Class
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder

  • Packages that use ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed
    This package contains classes for working with Consed.

    • Uses of ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed

      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed that return ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder.createIndividualPhdFiles(boolean createIndividualPhdFiles)
      Should individual phd files in the "phd_dir" directory be created instead of using one giant phd.ball file.
      ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder.inputChromatogramDir(File chromatDir)
      Provide a directory which contains sanger chromatograms to be included in this consed package.
      ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder.postProcessor(AceAssemblyTransformerPostProcessor postProcessor)
      Set the AceAssemblyTransformerPostProcessor to use to modify the Ace contigs after the transformation service has provided all the alignment information.
      ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder.setClock(Clock clock)
      Set the Clock to use for the timestamps for various assembly metadata.
      ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder ConsedAssemblyTransformerBuilder.setDefaultQualityValue(int qualityValue)
      Set the default quality value to use if an aligned read does not have associated quality data.
